talk.chat:
Vervato:
The corpse wasn't revived! This means that no one in your party is dead. Why did you ask me to revive a corpse without knowing that?!
You have caused me to waste both my time and my energy. Fool! Next time, make sure that someone in your party is actually dead before coming to see me.

Vervato:
I am Vervato! It is my sacred task to cheat death and revive fallen comrades whose spirits are ready to depart for the dark nether regions.
My magic is more powerful than even that of the sorcerers of the Elroki tribe; I am the greatest corpse summoner of them all!
But remember that summoning a corpse is only possible if there is a corpse... and, of course, the requisite fee.
Revive a corpse (2000000 Adena).
Quest.
